# Canadian Coast Guard Communications Portal for Integrated Incident Response (CPIIR) Tender

**Reference Number:** WS3458844334
**Publication Date:** August 12, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
**Solicitation Number:** WS3458844334

## Project Overview

The Canadian Coast Guard's (CCG) Communications Portal for Integrated Incident Response (CPIIR) project aims to modernize incident management by implementing one or more technical solutions for digital incident management. The project seeks to enhance resource management, intelligence and information management, command and coordination, operational communications, incident action planning, ICS forms, risk assessment, and Maritime Situational Awareness (MSA).

## Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

## Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type:** Request for Information
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

## Relevant Trade Agreements

The proposed procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

* **Contact Person:** Nicolas Mercier (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [nicolas.mercier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicolas.mercier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
